mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bbsno = #{bbsno} order by replyno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bbsno, replytext, replyer) values (#{bbsno}, #{replytext} ,#{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext = #{replytext}, updatedate = now() where replyno = #{replyno}
